function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Historical impacts of disease outbreaks on interior design","Impact":"Unhealthy or unsafe interior spaces, potential disease spread","Mitigation":"Implementation of healthy design principles and spatial reorganization","Technologies":"Smart design technology and spatial modeling","People":"Users of interior spaces","Owner":"Interior designers and architects"},{"Description":"Inconsistent measures across different building typologies","Impact":"Potential for disease spread in overcrowded interior spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of consistent health and safety protocols, reorganization of interior layouts","Technologies":"Smart building technologies and interior design software","People":"Building owners, architects, and designers","Owner":"Building owners and city authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of attention to community-level safety and prevention strategies","Impact":"Ineffective disease prevention and safety measures at the community level","Mitigation":"Implementation of meso-scale strategies, effective communication and support provision at community level","Technologies":"Spatial modeling and community engagement platforms","People":"Residents of communities","Owner":"City authorities and urban planners"}]}
